tag_list: sherilynn-macale, social-media, strategist, identified, editor, writer, news, journalist, tech, gaming
overview:
Professionally, Sherilynn “Cheri” Macale is a social media consultant currently available for hire. Previously, she was the acting social media strategist behind Identified.com with a heavy background in tech journalism as the lead social media news editor and personal branding expert at The Next Web. This is in addition to the content she regularly contributes to Virgin.com’s entrepreneurial blog.

She is perhaps best known for her 10+ year background in Lifestyle Blogging and Personal Branding, professional experience in advertising, marketing, and community management, as well as her YouTube Partnership for Makeup and Beauty tutorials. She is also recognized by the gaming community for her contributions to various sites like IGN, as well as her affiliations with gaming media.

Other professional exploits include her regular participation in several tech-and-gaming related projects and events, while producing mass content meant to cater to a growing audience.
